title: Red Knots Behaviour & Movement
description: I was the winner of the "ASAB council's choice" award in the ASAB video contest, Spring 2021. I created this science communication video showing how researchers study the behaviour and movement of red knots. This video is a wonderful look at the methods used for bird research, from capture to release and beyond

title: WATLAS Fieldwork on Griend
description: I made this video for NIOZ to show how we perform the WATLAS fieldwork which takes place on Griend and it is part of the Red Knots reseaerch

title: What's the third-person effect?
description: I made this video as part of the Communicating Science with the Public university course. It is addressed to Dutch high school students and it aims at informing about what the third-person effect is, how it affects people and why it is relevant today.
